metadata.json_formatter_tool_page_title: JSON Formatter | JSON Formatter Tool - ToolNier
metadata.json_formatter_tool_page_description: Professional JSON formatting and compression tool that supports automatic formatting, compression, validation, and beautification of JSON structures. Transform messy JSON data into readable indented formats or compress it into a single line to save space. Features real-time syntax checking, error highlighting, copy functionality, and file download capabilities. Helps developers, designers, and data analysts process JSON data more efficiently. Ideal for API development, data exchange, web application development, and more.
metadata.json_formatter_tool_page_keywords: JSON, JSON formatter, JSON formatter tool, JSON formatter online, JSON formatter free, JSON formatter app, JSON formatter toolnier
metadata.length_converter_title: Length Converter Tool | Length Unit Conversion - ToolNier
metadata.length_converter_description: A professional online length conversion tool supporting both metric (millimeters, centimeters, meters, kilometers) and imperial (inches, feet, yards, miles) units. Provides accurate calculation results with support for multiple decimal places. Ideal for use in engineering measurement, architectural design, interior renovation, scientific research, and other professional fields. This tool performs all calculations locally in your browser, ensuring data privacy. With a clean and intuitive interface, it offers instant conversions and a seamless experience for all your length unit conversion needs.
metadata.length_converter_keywords: length units, length converter, length converter tool, length converter online, free length converter, length converter app, length converter toolnier
metadata.weight_converter_title: Weight Converter Tool | Weight Unit Conversion - ToolNier
metadata.weight_converter_description: A professional online weight conversion tool supporting rapid conversions between metric (milligrams, grams, kilograms, metric tons) and imperial (ounces, pounds) units. Provides precise calculation results with support for multiple decimal places, ideal for food processing, chemical experiments, medical measurements, and other professional fields. This tool operates entirely in your browser locally, ensuring data security with no data uploads required. Features an intuitive interface with real-time conversion capabilities, making it effortless to handle various weight unit conversion needs.
metadata.weight_converter_keywords: weight units, weight converter, weight converter tool, weight converter online, free weight converter, weight converter app, weight converter toolnier

random_draw_page.title: Random Draw
random_draw_page.intro: Random draw tool can help you quickly and automatically select a random item from the input list, suitable for teaching, activity grouping, games, and other scenarios. Please enter the list in the box below, and click "Start drawing" to draw randomly.
random_draw_page.wheel_intro: Random draw wheel tool can help you quickly and automatically select a random item from the input options, suitable for teaching, activity grouping, games, and other scenarios. Please enter the options in the box below, and click "Start drawing" to draw randomly.
random_draw_page.intro_2: Random draw tool can help you quickly and automatically select a random item from the input list, suitable for teaching, activity grouping, games, and other scenarios. Please enter the list in the box below, and click "Start drawing" to draw randomly.

random_group_page.title: Random Group
random_group_page.error_message: Please enter a valid group count
random_group_page.description: Random group tool can help you quickly and automatically distribute the input items into a specified number of random groups, suitable for teaching, activity grouping, games, and other scenarios. Please enter the list and set the number of groups in the box below, and click "Start" to group randomly.

random_number_page.title: Random Number Generator
random_number_page.intro: Random number generator is suitable for lottery number selection, lottery, and other cases. You can set the starting number, ending number, number of generations, and select whether to exclude duplicate numbers.
random_number_page.error_message: Please check the settings correctly: the minimum value should be less than or equal to the maximum value, the number cannot be 0, and when excluding duplicates, the number cannot exceed the total number of numbers in the range.

qr_generator.title: QR Code Generator
qr_generator.description: Free online QR Code generator tool. Supports URL, text, Email conversion to QR Code, customizable colors and size, and download in PNG format, suitable for social media, websites, business cards, and other cases.

base64.title: Base64 Encoder Decoder Tool
base64.input_placeholder: Please enter the text to encode or decode
base64.description: Free online Base64 Encoder Decoder tool. Supports text, JSON, and other formats. Convert text to Base64 encoding and download. Supports decoding Base64 encoded text.

image_base64.title: Image Base64 Encoder & Decoder Tool
image_base64.description: Easily convert your image files (supports common formats like JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, etc.) into Base64 encoded strings. This tool quickly generates Data URLs usable in HTML, CSS, or JavaScript, allowing you to embed images directly into web pages, emails, or applications without external image links, improving loading speed and simplifying deployment.
image_base64.privacy_notice: Privacy Notice: All image processing is done locally in your browser. Your images are never uploaded to any server. Your image data remains completely on your device, ensuring data security and privacy.
image_base64.input_base64_placeholder: Enter the Base64 string to decode
image_base64.description_2: Paste the complete Base64 Data URL (e.g., `data:image/png;base64,...`), and the system will instantly decode it and preview the original image. You can conveniently view the image content corresponding to the Base64 string and download the restored image file.

uuid.title: UUID Generator

Whether you need a single UUID or to generate multiple UUIDs in bulk, this tool can instantly meet your needs. The generated UUIDs conform to standard formats and are suitable for database primary keys, distributed systems, unique identifiers, and various other development scenarios, ensuring global uniqueness.
